examples/serialdeviceinfo/main.cpp

00001 
00002 #include <QtCore>
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 
00005 #include <serialdeviceinfo.h>
00006 
00007 using namespace std;
00008 
00009 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00010 {
00011     QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
00012     
00013     SerialDeviceInfo info;
00014     
00015     char dn[50]; //device name
00016     
00017     while(1) {
00018         
00019         cout << "\n Please enter serial device name, specific by OS, \n example: in Windows -> COMn, in GNU/Linux -> /dev/ttyXYZn: ";
00020         cin >> dn;
00021     
00022         info.setName(dn);
00023         qDebug() << "\nsystemName   : " << info.systemName();
00024         qDebug() << "systemPath     : " << info.systemPath();
00025         qDebug() << "subSystem      : " << info.subSystem();
00026         qDebug() << "locationInfo   : " << info.locationInfo();
00027         qDebug() << "friendlyName   : " << info.friendlyName();
00028         qDebug() << "description    : " << info.description();
00029         qDebug() << "hardwareID     : " << info.hardwareID();
00030         qDebug() << "vendorID       : " << info.vendorID(); 
00031         qDebug() << "productID      : " << info.productID();  
00032         qDebug() << "manufacturer   : " << info.manufacturer() << "\n";  
00033         qDebug() << "isExists       : " << info.isExists();
00034         qDebug() << "isEmpty        : " << info.isEmpty();
00035         qDebug() << "isBusy         : " << info.isBusy() << "\n";
00036     }
00037     
00038     return app.exec();
00039 }
